control_attributes.Control: PE-18 LOCATION OF INFORMATION SYSTEM COMPONENTS
control_attributes.control_description: The organization positions information system components within the facility to minimize potential damage from [Assignment: organization-defined physical and environmental hazards] and to minimize the opportunity for unauthorized access.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization plans and coordinates security-related activities affecting the information system with [Assignment: organization-defined individuals or groups] before conducting such activities in order to reduce the impact on other organizational entities.

Control Statement: The organization positions information system components within the facility to minimize potential damage from [Assignment: organization-defined physical and environmental hazards] and to minimize the opportunity for unauthorized access.
Control Name: PE-18 LOCATION OF INFORMATION SYSTEM COMPONENTS
